Text:
No root password.
Scam.
Do not download.

See: https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7583171/A_Live_TV_OS_1.0_-_Ubuntu_Linux_Live_TV_Streaming_OS
Wrong not a scam as this new version does not require a root password, as the root password is set upon installing like any other ubuntu os.

I'm not installing it.
I'm running it live from USB drive.

Utanium, Please see ubuntu info on live cd's as there is no root logins allowed in live modes (guest accounts), after install and creating a real user account root access is simple by opening terminal command prompt and "sudo su" type the password of your real user account and bam you have a root prompt, there is nothing blocked or locking you out from complete access. Just learning how to is your issue. :))
